title: President Obama to Hold Rose Garden News Conference at 12:30PM EDT Tomorrow | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 22, 2009

 



President Obama to Hold Rose Garden News Conference at 12:30PM EDT Tomorrow




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                              June 22, 2009    President Obama to Hold Rose Garden News Conference at 12:30PM EDT Tomorrow  President Obama will host a Rose Garden news conference tomorrow afternoon. He will make opening remarks at 12:30PM EDT and take questions from the media afterwards. The news conference is open press. Pre-set: 11:15AM  Final Gather: 11:45AM  Gather at the North Doors of the Palm Room To attend, reporters must be cleared onto White House grounds. To obtain clearance, please email your full name, date of birth, social security number, and country of citizenship to press@who.eop.gov. The deadline to submit clearance requests for the news conference is 9:00AM EDT tomorrow, Tuesday, June 23rd.
